segments.text: I am sorry to trouble you , but there's a lot of noise in the next room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , is there ? Which room is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's . I think , neighbours on the right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , but I think so . I'm very exhausted , but I can't sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , ma'am . I'll check and tell them to be quiet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If next room is still noisy , could you give me a different room , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
